      • setScore

        public void setScore(int score)
        Setter for the score of Player
        Parameters:
        score - is the value set for the attribute. This value is computed at the end of the Game.

        Getter for the attribute tokens of Player.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Getter for the attribute connected.
        Returns:
        true if Player result connected to the Server, false otherwise.

      • setConnected

        public void setConnected(boolean connected)
        Setter for the attribute connected.
        Parameters:
        connected - Is the value set for the attribute: it will be true if the Player is connected, false otherwise.

      • getCandidates

        public Pattern[] getCandidates()
        Getter for the attribute candidates.
        Returns:
        the Pattern candidates of Player.

      • setCandidates

        public void setCandidates(Pattern[] candidates)
        Setter for the attribute candidates.
        Parameters:
        candidates - are the Pattern array among which the Player has to make his choice.

      • getPattern

        public Pattern getPattern()
        Getter for the attribute pattern.
        Returns:
        the Pattern chosen by the player.

      • setPattern

        public void setPattern(Pattern pattern)
        Setter for the attribute pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - is the Pattern set for the attribute. This method also set the number of tokens of the player that depends on the difficulty of the Pattern.

      • getCards

        public PrivateObjectiveCard[] getCards()
        Getter for the attribute cards
        Returns:
        the array of PrivateObjectiveCards of the player.

      • setCards

        public void setCards(PrivateObjectiveCard[] cards)
        Setter for the attribute cards.
        Parameters:
        cards - is array of PrivateObjectiveCards assigned to the Player.

      • consumeTokens

        public void consumeTokens(int n)
                   throws NotEnoughTokensException
        Method for decrementing the number of tokens of Player when using a ToolCard.
        Parameters:
        n - is the number of tokens needed for the usage of the ToolCard.
        Throws:
        NotEnoughTokensException - when the player doesn't have enough tokens to use the ToolCard.
